body_html:
For object detection why you even need to combine models, where you can use both models and get best of both.

Run model-1 on input image and run model-2 on input image.
Draw boxes for result of model-1 and result of model-2 on same image will give you detections for both COCO classes and your own classes.

Another thing you can do is to fine-tune COCO model with new dataset to add new classes. See tranfer Learning to know how to do that.
body_text:
For object detection why you even need to combine models, where you can use both models and get best of both.
Run model-1 on input image and run model-2 on input image.
Draw boxes for result of model-1 and result of model-2 on same image will give you detections for both COCO classes and your own classes.
Another thing you can do is to fine-tune COCO model with new dataset to add new classes. See tranfer Learning to know how to do that.
body:
For object detection why you even need to combine models, where you can use both models and get best of both.

Run model-1 on input image and run model-2 on input image.
Draw boxes for result of model-1 and result of model-2 on same image will give you detections for both COCO classes and your own classes.

Another thing you can do is to fine-tune COCO model with new dataset to add new classes. See tranfer Learning to know how to do that.
